Package edu.fiu.sysdesign

Class SelfCheckUtils

java.lang.Object
edu.fiu.sysdesign.SelfCheckUtils
public class SelfCheckUtils
extends java.lang.Object
This will essentially be a class of Static methods that you can use to test anything in your own classes. I will be adding more features to this as time goes on.
Author:
asengupt

  • Method Details

    • main

      public static void main​(java.lang.String[] args)
      Just for testing items in this class. Make sure your application does not use this main method for running your own applications!
      Parameters:
      args - n/a

    • basicSelfCheckRunner

      public static java.lang.String basicSelfCheckRunner​(SelfCheckCapable item)
      Runs a self-check and returns a prettified version of the result Note that the colors may not show correctly in some shells. DO NOT USE THIS AS THE ACTUAL SELF-CHECK! This will call self-check of the item passed in, so if you call it from the self-check method you will end up creating an infinite recursion!
      Parameters:
      item - the item to be tested
      Returns:
      the colorized version of the run. Colors may not show in all terminals

    • randomCheck

      public static boolean randomCheck()
      Super simple random check utility - simply calls a random function and returns true for half the cases, and false for half. To call this, you can simply do a return SelfCheckUtils.randomCheck();
      Returns:
      true for half the cases, false otherwise

    • randomCheck

      public static boolean randomCheck​(double probability)
      Another check utility - simply calls a random function and returns true for half the cases, and false for half. To call this, you can simply do a return SelfCheckUtils.randomCheck(0.25); // 25% chance of failure
      Parameters:
      probability - - the probability of a failure - send as a value between 0 and 1. 1 means 100% probability of failure, 0 means it will always be successful.
      Returns:
      true for half the cases, false otherwise
